column4: Welcome, you are now talking to an AI doctor. As I am part of a scientific experiment, I would appreciate it if you could take the time to answer a super short questionnaire at the end of the interview. Tap Speak to ask your question and then tap Send to submit it to me.
I can provide you with information on illnesses, diagnosis, and treatment options. I can also provide advice on lifestyle changes or other health management topics.
No, I'm sorry, I do not speak German. However, I can try to find information in German if that would be helpful.
I can look into finding resources in German for you. In the meantime, can you tell me what kind of medical information you're looking for?
That's concerning. Has your appetite changed drastically recently? Are you experiencing any other symptoms, such as fatigue, nausea, or shortness of breath?
